plot: In the film, Weslie and his crew discover an evil mechanical dragon who defeats Wolffy as he was attempting to capture the goats, but a series of good dragons rescue Weslie and the goats. ...
title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tai Lang Zhi Kaixin Chuang Long Nian
